channel.title: MidiPlayer Error?
channel.description:
Currently getting this error when running Client in eclipse:
[code] javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException: Undefined external error. at com.sun.media.sound.MidiOutDevice.nOpen(Native Method) at com.sun.media.sound.MidiOutDevice.implOpen(Unknown Source) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.doOpen(Unknown Source) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.openInternal(Unknown Source) at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.getReceiverReferenceCounting(Unknown Source) at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getReceiver(Unknown Source) at rs.play.MidiPlayer.<init>(MidiPlayer.java:11) at rs.Client.<init>(Client.java:14042) at rs.Client.main(Client.java:3652) [/code]
have tried searching for a fix but have been unable to find a working one. looking for more of a way to fix instead of copying code. thank you.

item.title: MidiPlayer Error?
item.dc:creator: @KingxRam KingxRam
item.description:
@KingxRam wrote:

Currently getting this error when running Client in eclipse:

javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException: Undefined external error.
	at com.sun.media.sound.MidiOutDevice.nOpen(Native Method)
	at com.sun.media.sound.MidiOutDevice.implOpen(Unknown Source)
	at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.doOpen(Unknown Source)
	at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.openInternal(Unknown Source)
	at com.sun.media.sound.AbstractMidiDevice.getReceiverReferenceCounting(Unknown Source)
	at javax.sound.midi.MidiSystem.getReceiver(Unknown Source)
	at rs.play.MidiPlayer.<init>(MidiPlayer.java:11)
	at rs.Client.<init>(Client.java:14042)
	at rs.Client.main(Client.java:3652)

have tried searching for a fix but have been unable to find a working one. looking for more of a way to fix instead of copying code. thank you.

Read full topic
